urls.title: Coronavirus: The celebrities donating millions to help during pandemic
urls.description: George and Amal Clooney, Angelina Jolie and Beyonce are among the stars supporting medics and food banks dealing with coronavirus.

text: @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/BzuyO4T0Po Those blessed with wealth contributing to variety of COVID-19 funds.
